title: Breads on Oak Cafe & Bakery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. European boulangerie atmosphere bakery and cafe. Makes artisan bread of which many are vegan. All of the muffins, brownies, cookies, and cakes are vegan and mostly organic. The breakfast and lunch items that are vegan suitable are marked with (V). During Mardi Gras season it offers vegan king cakes which are available for shipping. As of Jan 2016 it is offering vegan beer and organic wine. Connected to the cafe is a house & studio apartment for rent (inquire for details).
